reviews.review:
5.0 out of 5 stars
Broadband connection needed.
ByAmazon Customeron 25 March 2017
Hardware Platform: Pc
|
Verified Purchase
Nice game with good graphics .But the only thing is if you don't have a broadband connection you could not play this game.
1. At first u need some 400mb for steam update
2.Then u use the first cd in the box for installing
3.The second cd is not needed ,it downloads about 12 gb from steam on internet.
So guys be cautious. And if u have a broadband connection buy this game
I haven't played yet.Best u buy ACT Fiber net broadband
I have finished the game. This games is so hard and it is a best stealth game.
Play its sequel Hitman
Comment
|

5.0 out of 5 stars
A MUST OWN!!!!
BySamuel Osbornon 28 July 2014
Hardware Platform: Playstation 3
|
Verified Purchase
The plot of the game which requires prowess and strategy to see the game through will satiete the Hitman disciples. The thrilling chase will keep the gamer hooked till the very climax of the game. The plot thickens as 47 who is assigned to eliminate Diana and bring back Victoria, will play by his instinct and go against the agency.
The game is a steal for the price. A must have for every Hitman fan..... Stay in the shadows and savour every kill!!!!
Thank you Amazon for prompt delivery.
Comment

5.0 out of 5 stars
Great Game
Bykartik kochharon 24 April 2014
Hardware Platform: Xbox 360
|
Verified Purchase
Was somewhat in a dilemma while placing the order as the platform stated Nintendo Wii instead of Xbox 360. Took the gamble as I was aware of the Amazon's Amazing return policy. The product was delivered on the mentioned date. packing was fine and well protected. Would recommend anyone to opt for this game as its a steal at this price.
Have checked other websites however they stated that the disc was ripped from Steam and 2 GB of game needs to be downloaded. However the game was a complete retail copy and an update of only 2MB was required from Xbox Live.
Would recommend other to buy this game.
Thanks.

5.0 out of 5 stars
Superb !!
Bylokeshon 11 June 2014
Hardware Platform: Xbox 360
Having played all the previous Hitman games,i had to go for this as well. but i didn't purchase it immediately, i waited for a discount sale and got it for 400 bucks only,ya that's right, an xbox 360 game for just 400. anyways coming to the gameplay, it left me in awe,the story was interesting enough for me to finish it within 8 days of 2 hour sessions. also replayability is an issue,once you know the plot it doesn't interest you to play it in another level. but nonetheless, its an amazing game and a must buy for all hitman fans.

4.0 out of 5 stars
Great game, not much to complain about.
BySiddharth Senon 5 March 2015
Hardware Platform: Playstation 3
|
Verified Purchase
A very good game. Installs fast. Gameplay is amazing, will keep you on your toes. I would reccommend playing it on hard at least, that's where the concept of stealth and creativity really come into play. Graphics are nice but could be sliiiightly better. I enjoyed this game a LOT. Would reccommend it to anyone who likes stealth games with violence in them. Could be a bit more open ended, but still fun.
Thanks to amazon for quick delivery.
